overview: "'True Stories' is a very fun and ironic way to bring the spectator a little more close to the scene. The main girl or the main acuter tells the story, which is basically not really a sotry but is a fantasy. I have to say it is quite fun to shoot this line even though it is not always easy for the language problem - not everybody speaks English very well (including myself). Definitely the first scene, with Angelika Grays, I loved very much. But my preferred girl through the whole movie is Olivia Sin, the small Russina girl - very, very sexy. I wish I could have shot more scenes with her; she is really special. Also, I love the scene with Tiffany Tatum, about the nasty secretary fantasy. This is definitely a fantasy for many people."  -Rocco Siffredi
title: Rocco's True Stories 2
